verbs.description: [ARG0: Secretary of State Mike Pompeo] [V: told] [ARG2: reporters] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [ARG1: that President Donald Trump ’s commitment to end joint military exercises in South Korea is contingent on productive negotiations with North Korea] .

Secretary of State Mike Pompeo told reporters Wednesday that President Donald Trump ’s commitment to [V: end] [ARG1: joint military exercises in South Korea] is contingent on productive negotiations with North Korea .
